definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: under (BH [[תַּחַתּ]]; Targum [[תְּחוֹת]], Syr. th.uwt, th.eyt, adv. ltah.t; Plam. [[מן לתחת]] Cooke:320);—Da 7:27 [[תְּחוֹת כָּל־שְׁמַיׇּא]] (cf. BH

definitions.title: II. 1
definitions.body: ); in pl. c. sf. (as BH Syr. Targum) Da 4:9 [[תְּחׂתׂהִי]] (so Targum:o Le 15:10: Dalm:§ 47, 2), v:Da 4:18. With [[מִן]], Je 10:11 [[מִן תְּחוֹת שְׁמַיׇּא]] (cf. BH

definitions.title: III. 2
definitions.body: ); sf. Da 4:11 [[מִן־תַּחְתּוֹהִי]] (the form as Syr. adv. supr., unless a Hebraizing punct.).
